title: Marinated roast peppers
ingredients: ['1 red pepper', '1 green pepper', '1 yellow pepper', '1 1/2 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste']
